title: Introduction to AI
description: A quick overview of Artificial Intelligence and its applications.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence by machines...\n\nApplications include computer vision, NLP, robotics, and more. This post introduces key ideas and terms in plain language.

title: Web Development Trends 2025
description: Discover the latest trends in web development.
content: In 2025, web development is shaped by AI-assisted tooling, edge rendering, serverless backends, and component-driven design systems.\n\nWe explore how to choose the right stack and avoid over-engineering.

title: Disaster Management Preparedness
description: Understanding disaster preparedness and planning management.
content: Disaster preparedness involves proactive planning, training, early warning systems, and effective communication strategies.\n\nThis post offers a simple framework for households and campuses.
